mapper.insert: insert into user (uid, username, password, name, email, phone, addr, state, code, isAdmin) values (#{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isadmin,jdbcType=INTEGER})

uid,

mapper.update:
update user
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
addr = #{addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
isAdmin = #{isadmin,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
